thread.title: Great Location
thread.title_full: Great Location - Review of Hilton Garden Inn New York/Tribeca, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Edwin T
title: Great Location
text: This hotel is in a great location in Tribeca. I had a business meeting and it was blocks away. The room was spacious for New York City and the are was comfortable. I had breakfast in the restaurant and that was good, Also I needed room service. which was impeccable. This part of town is very walkable.
